fields.title: Coastal View with Lilies
fields.description: A vibrant canvas piece depicting a tranquil coastal scene viewed through an arched window. The foreground flowers were added to the canvas, while the rest of the scene was painted freehand.

fields.title: Cocktail Bar Scene
fields.description: A stylish mural capturing the atmosphere of a cocktail bar, inspired by artists like Rihanna and Daft Punk. Perfect for adding a modern, musical vibe to any space.

fields.title: Guardian Angel Mural
fields.description: A powerful mural of a guardian angel, painted on an exterior wall for a private residence. The piece is designed to be a striking and protective presence.

fields.title: Music for the Jilted Generation
fields.description: A dynamic and gritty piece inspired by the iconic album cover for The Prodigy's 'Music for the Jilted Generation.' This mural captures the raw energy of the original artwork.

fields.title: Marilyn Monroe Portrait
fields.description: A classic black and white portrait of Marilyn Monroe, painted for a local dance studio. This piece captures her timeless elegance and iconic look.

fields.title: Beauty and the Beast
fields.description: A whimsical depiction of Lumi√®re and Mrs. Potts from Disney's Beauty and the Beast. This playful mural was created to add a touch of magic to a dance studio.

fields.title: Castle on the Cliff
fields.description: A dramatic, monochromatic mural of a castle perched on a cliffside. This atmospheric piece was designed to create a unique and imaginative feature wall within a dance studio.

fields.title: Stairway to Heaven
fields.description: An ethereal landscape mural painted for a small business in Tasmania. The piece, titled 'Stairway to Heaven,' creates a serene and dreamlike pathway on a large exterior wall.

fields.title: Mind of a Dancer
fields.description: A vibrant and conceptual mural illustrating the different styles and disciplines of dance exploding from a creative mind. Painted for a studio to inspire energy and passion.

fields.title: Daft Punk Tribute
fields.description: A mural of Daft Punk at a bar, part of the 'Cocktail Bar Scene' project.

fields.title: Jilted Generation - The Ravers
fields.description: A detail shot of the 'Music for the Jilted Generation' mural, showing the crowd and vans.

fields.title: Jilted Generation - The Police
fields.description: A detail shot of the 'Music for theJilted Generation' mural, showing the police confrontation.

fields.title: Jilted Generation - The Protester
fields.description: A detail shot of the 'Music for the Jilted Generation' mural, focusing on the main figure.

fields.title: Jilted Generation - The Vans
fields.description: A close-up of the vans and crowd from the 'Music for the Jilted Generation' mural.

fields.title: Jilted Generation - Police Line
fields.description: A close-up of the police line and dog from the 'Music for the Jilted Generation' mural.

fields.title: Jilted Generation - Protester Close-up
fields.description: A close-up of the main figure's face and arm from the 'Music for the Jilted Generation' mural.

fields.title: Gold-Tipped Penguins
fields.description: A collection of handcrafted ceramic penguins, each with a unique shape and a gold-tipped beak.

fields.title: Penguin Pottery (Close-up)
fields.description: A close-up view of the gold-tipped ceramic penguins, showing the glaze and detail.

fields.title: Jilted Generation - Officer
fields.description: A close-up of the police officer with a megaphone from the 'Music for the Jilted Generation' mural.

fields.title: Restaurant Sign Writing
fields.description: Vibrant yellow bubble-lettering sign for a restaurant, painted on an exterior blue wall.

fields.title: Anatomical Skull Sculpture
fields.description: A realistic, life-sized anatomical skull sculpture, viewed from the front. Handcrafted piece.

fields.title: Skull Sculpture (Side Profile)
fields.description: A side profile view of the anatomical skull sculpture, showing the detail of the jaw and cranium.

fields.title: Jilted Generation - Full View
fields.description: A wider view of the 'Music for the Jilted Generation' mural, showing the main figure and the landscape.
